sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { DocumentTextIcon, ChatBubbleBottomCenterTextIcon, MagnifyingGlassIcon, ShieldCheckIcon, UserGroupIcon, GlobeAltIcon, StarIcon, PlayIcon, } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { GlassButton } from '../components/ui'; const features = [ { name: 'AI Document Translation', description: 'Transform complex legal jargon into clear, understandable language tailored to your reading level.', icon: DocumentTextIcon, color: 'from-blue-500 to-blue-600', }, { name: 'Smart Legal Assistant', description: 'Get instant answers to legal questions with context-aware AI that understands your documents.', icon: ChatBubbleBottomCenterTextIcon, color: 'from-purple-500 to-purple-600', }, { name: 'Intelligent Search', description: 'Find relevant legal precedents and documents using natural language search powered by AI.', icon: MagnifyingGlassIcon, color: 'from-green-500 to-green-600', }, ]; const stats = [ { label: 'Documents Simplified', value: '10K+', icon: DocumentTextIcon }, { label: 'Communities Served', value: '500+', icon: UserGroupIcon }, { label: 'Languages Supported', value: '15+', icon: GlobeAltIcon }, { label: 'User Satisfaction', value: '4.9/5', icon: StarIcon }, ]; const testimonials = [ { content: "DocuLaw AI made it possible for me to understand my rental agreement. I never realized what I was signing before.", author: "Maria Rodriguez", role: "Community Member", avatar: "M.R", }, { content: "As a community advocate, this tool helps me explain legal documents to families who don't speak English as their first language.", author: "James Chen", role: "Community Advocate", avatar: "J.C", }, { content: "Finally, legal help that doesn't cost hundreds of dollars. This is exactly what our community needed.", author: "Aisha Williams", role: "Small Business Owner", avatar: "A.W", }, ]; const Landing: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* Navigation */}
DocuLaw AI
Sign In Get Started
{/* Hero Section - Minimalist */}
{/* Left Side - Text */}

Legal Help That{' '} Everyone Deserves

Transform complex legal documents into plain English. Get AI-powered legal assistance designed for underserved communities who can't afford expensive lawyers.

{/* Right Side - Buttons */}
Start Your Journey →

✓ No credit card required

✓ Free for basic use

✓ 2-minute setup

{/* Stats Row - Bottom */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.value}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Problem Statement */}

The Legal Literacy Crisis

Millions of Americans struggle with legal documents, creating barriers to justice and opportunity in our communities.

67%

Struggle to Understand

of Americans can't comprehend basic legal documents

$350

Per Hour

Average cost of legal consultation in major cities

45M

Need Help

Americans who need but cannot afford legal assistance

{/* Features */}

AI-Powered Legal Assistance

Our platform combines cutting-edge AI with legal expertise to make complex documents accessible to everyone.

{features.map((feature, index) => (

{feature.name}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Testimonials */}

Real Stories from Real People

See how DocuLaw AI is making a difference in communities across America

{testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (
{testimonial.avatar}
{testimonial.author}
{testimonial.role}

"{testimonial.content}"

))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Get Started?

Join thousands of people who have already simplified their legal documents. It only takes 2 minutes to get personalized legal assistance.

Start Free Assessment Try Demo First

No credit card required • Free for basic use • Secure & confidential

{/* Footer */}
DocuLaw AI

Making legal documents accessible to underserved communities through AI-powered translation and assistance.

Product

  • Features
  • Pricing
  • Security

Support

  • Help Center
  • Contact
  • Community

© 2024 DocuLaw AI. All rights reserved. Built to serve underserved communities.

); }; export default Landing;
